author: asnal12
content:
Hey folks, I am a software developer with 2 years of experience. I have been working as a backend developer since the inception of my career. My field has always been NLP, machine learning with sound experience of microservices. I have completed beginner tutorial for smart contracts from cryptozombies. Now looking for some cool projects or hackarhons to work and gain more insight into blockchain(DeFi particularly). Hit me up if you any suggestions on hackathons or projects that I should go for.
Thanks
